titleStmt.title: A strange vineyard in Palæstina in an exposition of Isaiahs parabolical song of the beloued, discouered: to which Gods vineyard in this our land is paralleld. By Nehemiah Rogers, Master in Arts, and pastor of the congregation at Messing in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Nehemiah, 1593-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Hauiland for Edward Brewster, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Starre at the west-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Starre at the west-end of Pauls
